name: L Events Calendar
author: Loi Truong

sections.description:
A WordPress plugin for a beautiful responsive calendar. Manage events with ease and simplicity.

Demo

http://loitruong.us/project/l-events-calendar/demo/

Github

http://github.com/loitruong/l-events-calendar/

Bug Submission and Support

https://github.com/loitruong/l-events-calendar/issues

Honor Contributor

JoeFusco

Please Vote and Enjoy

Your votes really make a difference! Thanks.
sections.installation:
1. Upload l-events-calendar to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Drop the shortcode [l-events-calendar] into page, or you can click l-events button on top of your editor.
  4. Click on the new admin menu item “L-Events” and create your event.
sections.faq:
Q. Can I upload my own calendar images?

A. Yes you can!
sections.changelog:

  • [Added] Media button add shortcode
  • [Development] [Added] Grunt environment for quick compiling

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
